name: mapmap
description: Library for creating maps based on SVG and D3.js in the browser.
author: Florian Ledermann

scripts.browserify-production: browserify src/index.js --standalone mapmap --ignore d3-dsv | uglifyjs > mapmap.min.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify-dev && npm run browserify-production
scripts.version: npm run build && git add mapmap.js mapmap.min.js
